Listen Song
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SongsService } from 'src/app/shared/services/songs/songs.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-songs-page', templateUrl: './songs-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./songs-page.component.css'] }) export class SongsPageComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private songService: SongsService) { } songs: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.songService.getSongs().subscribe( (data: any) => { this.songs = data.results; } ) } }
